extendedInfo.description: The Official Chinmayi Sripada Mobile App. Chinmayi Sripada is an Indian playback singer. She is also a voice actor in Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada and Hindi. She is the founder and CEO of a translation services company called Blue Elephant. She has worked as a television presenter and a radio jockey. The App keeps you up to date with Chinmayi's Songs, Videos, Photos, Social Media Updates, Awards etc. This is also the First Ever Interactive App where you can ask Chinmayi your questions through the Feature "Ask Me!" which will be unlocked very soon. Also, Be the first to know about the latest Tour Dates, Awards and Exclusive Singles! Chinmayi Sripada Mobile App has a lot of firsts to its credits. Chinmayi is the First Indian Musician to have an App in both the iOS and Android Platform. She is also the first Female Singer to have an App in India. "Be Anything you want to be. Chase every dream. Treasure every opportunity. Be the best that you can ever be." - Chinmayi

reviews.title: Purush
reviews.comment: First thanks for this app. Now I gonna list my wishes and opinion abt this app. 1. I wish the songs listed can be downloadable because in India no of users of 3g is very low to listen d song online. 2. Pls add photo gallery also. 3. Include twitter msg here. 4. Move to SD card is very important.  thanks Purush. Chennai
